org.springframework.boot.logging

类 LoggingSystemProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.logging.LoggingSystemProperties

  • public class LoggingSystemProperties
extends Object
    Utility to set system properties that can later be used by log configuration files.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static String CONSOLE_LOG_PATTERN
      The name of the System property that contains the console log pattern.
      static String EXCEPTION_CONVERSION_WORD
      The name of the System property that contains the exception conversion word.
      static String FILE_LOG_PATTERN
      The name of the System property that contains the file log pattern.
      static String FILE_MAX_HISTORY
      The name of the System property that contains the file log max history.
      static String FILE_MAX_SIZE
      The name of the System property that contains the file log max size.
      static String LOG_DATEFORMAT_PATTERN
      The name of the System property that contains the log date-format pattern.
      static String LOG_FILE
      The name of the System property that contains the log file.
      static String LOG_LEVEL_PATTERN
      The name of the System property that contains the log level pattern.
      static String LOG_PATH
      The name of the System property that contains the log path.
      static String PID_KEY
      The name of the System property that contains the process ID.
